small.description: a tight, shadowed space where the walls seem to whisper. Magic lingers in the still air, close and tense.

medium.description: a comfortably open area, wide enough to breathe yet still enclosed. Movement feels natural, with space to pause and plan.

large.description: an expansive chamber that stretches well beyond the eye’s first glance. Echoes take their time returning, and steps feel lighter here.

huge.description: a colossal void where size itself becomes disorienting. The boundaries are distant, the scale humbling—like walking through a dream too big to hold.
